mapper.sql: ID, USER_ID, RECOMMENDATION_DATE, CALORIES, PROTEIN, CARBOHYDRATE, FAT, FIBER, SODIUM, RECOMMENDATION_TYPE, NOTES, CREATE_TIME
mapper.select: SELECT r.ID, r.USER_ID, r.RECOMMENDATION_DATE, r.CALORIES, r.PROTEIN, r.CARBOHYDRATE, r.FAT, r.FIBER, r.SODIUM, r.RECOMMENDATION_TYPE, r.NOTES, r.CREATE_TIME, u.USER_NAME, u.GENDER FROM SYSDBA.NUTRITION_RECOMMENDATION r LEFT JOIN SYSDBA."USER" u ON r.USER_ID = u.ID WHERE r.ID = #{id}

SELECT r.ID, r.USER_ID, r.RECOMMENDATION_DATE, r.CALORIES, r.PROTEIN, r.CARBOHYDRATE, r.FAT, r.FIBER, r.SODIUM, r.RECOMMENDATION_TYPE, r.NOTES, r.CREATE_TIME, u.USER_NAME, u.GENDER FROM SYSDBA.NUTRITION_RECOMMENDATION r LEFT JOIN SYSDBA."USER" u ON r.USER_ID = u.ID WHERE r.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY r.CREATE_TIME DESC OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH NEXT 1 ROWS ONLY
